i am not able to reset first name and la: 1. Move to the left bottom near profile section 2 then there is pencil icon on clicking you can change your first name last name and upload picture 3 Then save it
how to upload status: 1. Move to Bottom left near profile section there is an upload sign where you can click and then you are redirected to status page select text or image which you want to upload and then click setstatus and now you're status is uploaded
